dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: I'm so excited to finally arrive in Wonderland!

dialogues.speaker: Rabbit
dialogues.text: Hurry up, we're late for the Queen's tea party!

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As they rush down the path, Alice can't help but notice the strange and fantastical creatures watching from the sidelines.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: This is all so surreal. I feel like I'm dreaming!

dialogues.speaker: Rabbit
dialogues.text: No time for that now, we must make haste! The Queen's patience wears thin.
